extendedInfo.description: The forehead-slapping fun of The Moron Test is back in The Moron Test 2, the highly anticipated sequel to Google Play's favorite brain-teaser! The classic fun you know and love has graduated to brand new puzzles, hilarious animations, and much more! Master the game, then laugh as your friends and family struggle with these seemingly simple puzzles!The Moron Test 2 - it's fun to FAIL! FEATURES: - Simple, addicting gameplay- Two sections with dozens of puzzles each- Brand new puzzle types to touch, twist and shake- Beautiful Retina graphics- Catchy music and hilarious sounds- You will LOVE watching your friends FAIL!SECTIONS:- âFair Gameâ- âOut Sickâ- âField Dayâ- More sections coming soon!Download now and start the fun!

reviews.title: Not as challenging as I hoped
reviews.comment: I didn\'t find most of the puzzles to be \"brain teasers\", but more a measurement of how well instructions are followed.  It was worth 99 cents, but for me it was about 10 minutes of entertainment.  Probably better suited to a 12 to 15 year old, in my opinion.
reviews.author: Natalia H

reviews.comment: I like the first one better it makes sense. This one does not make any sense. You just have to guess at times. I still think the game is entertaining.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love the game but...
reviews.comment: It got an update and now it won\'t open on my samsung galaxy s. Please fix. I paid for this one and would like to use it!

reviews.comment: I absolutly love all of them. Make more !! (:

reviews.title: Annoyingly annoying
reviews.comment: Addictive, and great at making you feel foolish.
reviews.author: James Davis

reviews.title: W & I
reviews.comment: \'Wonderful\' & \'Infuriating\' Well worth the paltry cost but prepare to be challenged as well as highly amused!

reviews.title: SO ADDICTED
reviews.comment: Works great have had no problems with it. I have bought every Moron Test apparently they have out. Now just need MORE PLZZZ!!!! :) Samsung Galaxy S2

reviews.title: Recommended
reviews.comment: Worth every penny!!! Galaxy S3.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun!
reviews.comment: For one who has, uh less than optimal hand-eye coordination, this game is fun but sure makes me feel like a \"moron\" at times!!
reviews.author: Debi Hagberg

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: This really is NOTHING like the first Moron Test. The ONLY things that are better are the graphics and characters. Its more like a THINK FAST kind of game along with memory. Unlike the first Moron Test which was was common sense and \"wow I didnt see that.\" I honestly dont like it, and I felt like I could have spent that dollar on a better game. Sorry guys.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: not worth the money
reviews.comment: If you mess up you have to start ALL OVER AGAIN! it\'s ridiculous you have to be precise when tapping something if your a hair off you\'ll loose its a waste of time another note they have one that says \"choose the largest character\" there\'s a giraffe so I tap it and I loose the righr one is a TURTLE yes that makes a lot of sense a turtle is larger than a giraffe
reviews.author: Ronnie Galvan

reviews.title: Best game EVER!
reviews.comment: This is the best game ever, in the history of all games that have ever existed.... or ever will exist in the future......ever!    Best      Game          Ever!!!
